description.value:
Once per day when you cast a summoning spell, any one creature you summon is more powerful than normal. The creature gains the advanced creature simple template. If you summon more than one creature with a spell, only one of the summoned creatures gains the advanced creature simple template. A summoned creature that gains the advanced creature simple template in this manner looks unusually deformed or hideous. This ability only works on spells you cast as a clericâ€”it does not work on spellcasting abilities gained from any other spellcasting classes you might have.

This power replaces the Guarded Mind power of the Void Domain.
